originalText.text: I am so impressed with the antique rug cleaning service I received from this company. This company is top notch! They scheduled a free price quote right away and came to my house to check out the job. They handled my rug with great care and collected it for cleaning in their factory. After waiting patiently, my rug came back to me looking fresh and new! Their attention to detail as well as customer satisfaction is outstanding!

originalText.text: Great carpet cleaning company. Happy to recommend them for anyone in the area. They did a great job for us and based on our experience we highly suggest them for all your carpet cleaning needs!!!

originalText.text: Love the way my Persian rugs look after a good clean by your team. Thank you for doing such a good job. Everyone was so pleasant and professional.

originalText.text: He was professional and a pleasure to have in my home. He did a thorough job and the carpet looks new! I will definitely refer them and call again!

text.text: He was professional and a pleasure to have in my home. He did a thorough job and the carpet looks new! I will definitely refer them and call again!

originalText.text: The cleaning guys that came to do the job were very good at what they do! From the way they were very personable and friendly, to the way they efficiently did the whole carpet cleaning process, all I can say is that he is definitely someone who knows what they’re doing. Never thought I’d see the day my rugs were THIS clean!
